original_title: Geschundenes Zelluloid - Das Schicksal des Kinoklassikers "Im Westen nichts Neues"
overview: The 1930 Hollywood-produced anti-war film "Nothing New in the West" is one of the great works in film history. But like hardly any other cinema classic, it was ostracized, shortened, censored, altered in image and sound and banned. The documentary deals with the eventful fate and especially the censorship history of the film classic.
tagline: The fate of the cinema classic "All Quiet on the Western Front"
title: Bruised Celluloid
